title: Maryland cookies copycat recipe
ingredients: ['165g vegetable shortening (e.g. TREK) or margarine', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '75g caster sugar', '4 tablespoons golden syrup', '2 teaspoons milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '260g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '100g plain chocolate chips']
